original_text: And the chapiters upon the two pillars had pomegranates also above, over against the belly which was by the network: and the pomegranates were two hundred in rows round about upon the other chapiter.
korean_text: 이 두 기둥 머리에 있는 그물 곁 곧 그 머리의 공 같이 둥근 곳으로 돌아가며 각기 석류 이백 개가 줄을 지었더라

sentences.original_text: And the chapiters upon the two pillars had pomegranates also above
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 두 기둥 위의 머릿돌들은 위에 석류들도 가졌으며

sentences.original_text: over against the belly which was by the network
sentences.korean_translation: 그물 옆에 있는 배 모양 조각에 맞대어

sentences.original_text: and the pomegranates were two hundred in rows
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 석류들은 이백 개가 줄로 있었으며

sentences.original_text: round about upon the other chapiter
